lead_paragraph: The findings highlight challenges for the police and others trying to maintain order while sustaining faith in the criminal justice system.

headline.print_headline: Views on Race Relations Worsen, Poll Finds
headline.main: Negative View of U.S. Race Relations Grows, Poll Finds

snippet: The findings highlight challenges for the police and others trying to maintain order while sustaining faith in the criminal justice system.
abstract: New York Times/CBS News poll finds that Americans' views on race relations have worsened since the death of Freddie Gray in Baltimore while in police custody; poll results highlight the challenges facing local leaders and police across the nation who are responsible for maintaining order while also trying to sustain Americans' faith in the criminal justice system.
